title: "Novant Health is now using artificial intelligence to help read CAT scans in Charlotte"
excerpt: "Novant Health is now using artificial intelligence at its Presbyterian Medical Center in Charlotte to help emergency room doctors read CAT scans. The idea is to catch patients with more serious injuries quickly."
